titles.title: To provide that the costs relating to repairs correcting seepage problems at Twin Buttes Dam, Texas, are nonreimbursable.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E1267)
Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Oversight and Investigations.

term.name: Federal aid to water resources development

bill.summary: 6/21/1994--Introduced. Makes nonreimbursable under Federal reclamation laws the water seepage repair costs at Twin Buttes Dam, Texas.
